text: Alfredo (, ) is a male given name from the Germanic name Alfred. It is a common Italian, Galician, Portuguese and Spanish language personal name. Alfredo is a commonly used name for males with origins in the Germanic language. Its etymology can be traced back to the Old English name "Ælfræd," which translates to "elf counsel" or "wise counselor." The name has a rich history spanning centuries and has been popularized by numerous prominent individuals throughout the ages. This name was ranked #707 on the US Popular Names in 2021. == People == *Alfredo Lim (1929–2020), Filipino politician *Alfredo Di Stéfano (1926–2014), Argentine-Spanish football coach and player *Alfredo Palacio (born 1939), former President of Ecuador *Alfredo Quintana (1988–2021), Portuguese handballer *Alfredo Sirkis (1950–2020), Brazilian politician and writer *Alfredo Stroessner (1912–2006), President of Paraguay (1954–1989) and general == References ==
title: Alfredo (name)
